name: Fantasy Core
author: CharaForge
description: The premium version of Fantasy Basics. Create epic fantasy characters with expanded options for armor, mythical races, and enchanted locations.

promptTemplates.name: Epic Cinematic Portrait
promptTemplates.template: {camera}, epic cinematic portrait of a legendary {count} {raceClass}, {expression}. They wear ornate {torso_armor}, {shoulders_armor}, and {legs_armor}, wielding a powerful {hands_weapon}. Their {hair} flows in the wind. The background is a breathtaking {background}, with {effects} lighting.

promptTemplates.name: Grim Dark Style
promptTemplates.template: A grim, dark fantasy painting of a battle-hardened {count} {raceClass}, {expression}, wearing worn {torso_armor} and {legs_armor}. They carry a menacing {hands_weapon}, lurking in a {background} under {effects} lighting.

promptTemplates.name: Character Sheet Concept
promptTemplates.template: {camera}, full body character concept art of a {count} {raceClass} on a white background, clean detailed line art. They are equipped with a {hands_weapon}, and wearing {torso_armor} and {legs_armor}.
